rules:
    protocol-https-only-oas2:
        description: ALL requests MUST go through https protocol only
            :
        given: $
        message: Schemes MUST be https and no other value is allowed.
        recommended: true
        severity: error
            field: schemes
            function: schema
                            :
                        type: string
                    maxItems: 1
                    type: array
        type: style
            :
